Question: Haikubox CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Loggerhead Instruments

Haikubox CES 2024

- Advanced audio recognition and AI analysis for bird song detection and bird visitor identification
- 24/7 operation to alert users to avian visitors, enhancing connection to the natural world
- Contributes to bird conservation efforts and scientific insights on climate change impacts
- User-friendly interface accessible to everyone, regardless of tech-savviness
- Integration with Cornell Lab of Ornithology's neural network for bird song analysis
- Haikubox app for identifying bird species and contributing to AI improvement
- Offers real-time and historical birdsong data with species identification and links for further information
